vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
Δημήτριος, -ου, ὁ
Demetrius;
__1. a silversmith, Act.19:24 38.
__2. A Christian disciple, III Jn 12.†
(From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of the New Testament, first mentioned at Act.19.24
§ Demetrius, "of Demeter"
Demetrius, (Proper name) (1) The Ephesian silversmith, Acts 19:24, 38 (2) A certain Christian, 3Jn. 12*
vocabInfos._es_Definition: Demetrio: (1) un platero de Éfeso (HCH.19:24,38) ; (2) un líder de la iglesia (3JN.1:12)
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
底米丟 这个陽性專有名詞在希腊文的意思是 "屬於柯瑞斯神(Ceres)"
1) 在以弗所的異教徒銀匠
低米丟
2) 一名信徒 ( 約參12)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
底米丢这个阳性专有名词在希腊文的意思是"属于柯瑞斯神(Ceres)"
1) 在以弗所的异教徒银匠
低米丢
2) 一名信徒( 约参12)
